content.question: In the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane, the function <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math>, given by <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 to the power of open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses end exponent"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>, is a horizontal translation of the exponential function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math>, given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 to the power of x"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>. Which of the following is an equivalent form for <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> that expresses <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> as a vertical dilation of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 to the power of open parentheses x divided by 2 close parentheses end exponent"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>
<math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 9 times 3 to the power of x"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>

<math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 9 times open parentheses 1 third close parentheses to the power of x"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mi>x</mi></msup></math>
<math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 9 plus 3 to the power of x"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 9 times 3 to the power of x"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
